info.title: Notion
info.description: Notion connector use the API to access Notion's pages, databases, and users.

get.description: Retrieves a User using the ID specified.

type.description: Type of the user. Possible values are "person" and "bot".
type.title: Type

Bot.title: asc
Bot.description: Properties only present for bot users.

next_cursor.title: Next Cursor

has_more.title: Has more

get.description: Returns a paginated list of Users for the workspace

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100

delete.description: Sets a Block object, including page blocks, to archived: true using the ID specified. Note: in the Notion UI application, this moves the block to the "Trash" where it can still be accessed and restored.

patch.description: Updates the content for the specified block_id based on the block type. Supported fields based on the block object type

content.description: Text content. This field contains the actual content of your text and is probably the field you'll use most often.
content.title: Content

next_cursor.title: Next cursor

has_more.description: Whether or not the block has more blocks or not
has_more.title: Has more

get.description: Returns a paginated array of child block objects contained in the block using the ID specified

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items from the full list desired in the response. Maximum: 100

patch.description: Creates and appends new children blocks to the parent block_id specified.

heading_1.description: Heading one block objects contain the Rich_text object within the heading_1 property

get.description: Retrieves a Database object using the ID specified.

created_time.description: Date and time when this page was created.
created_time.title: Created time

last_edited_time.description: Date and time when this page was updated.
last_edited_time.title: Last edited time

Tags.description: The tags object contains the list of tags.
Tags.title: Tags

next_cursor.description: A cursor returned used to request the next page of results. Treat this as an opaque value
next_cursor.title: Next cursor

has_more.description: Whether or not the block has more blocks or not
has_more.title: Has more

post.description: Searches all pages and child pages that are shared with the integration. The results may include databases.

query.description: When supplied, limits which pages are returned by comparing the query to the page title.
query.title: Query

direction.description: The direction to sort. Possible values include ascending and descending.
direction.title: Direction

timestamp.description: The name of the timestamp to sort against. Possible values include last_edited_time.
timestamp.title: Timestamp

post.description: Gets a list of Pages contained in the database, filtered and ordered according to the filter conditions and sort criteria provided in the request.

name.description: User's name as displayed in Notion.
name.title: Name

type.description: Type of the user. Possible values are "person" and "bot".
type.title: Type

type.description: The type of owner - either "workspace" or "user".
type.title: Owner type

owner.description: Information about who owns this bot.

bot.description: Properties only present for bot users."If viewing your own bot with GET /v1/users/me or GET /v1/users/{{your_bot_id}}, this field will be populated with more information about the bot."

get.description: Retrieves the bot User associated with the API token provided in the authorization header. The bot will have an owner field with information about the person who authorized the integration.

has_more.description: When the response includes the end of the list, false. Otherwise, true.
has_more.title: Has more

created_time.description: Date and time when this page was created. Formatted as an ISO 8601 date time string.
created_time.title: Created time

last_edited_time.description: Date and time when this page was updated. Formatted as an ISO 8601 date time string.
last_edited_time.title: Last edited time

url.description: Link to the externally hosted image.
url.title: url

archived.description: The archived status of the page.
archived.title: archived

url.description: The URL of the Notion page.
url.title: URL

get.description: Retrieves a Page object using the ID specified.

created_time.description: Date and time when this page was created. Formatted as an ISO 8601 date time string.
created_time.title: Created time

last_edited_time.description: Date and time when this page was updated. Formatted as an ISO 8601 date time string.
last_edited_time.title: Last edited time

url.title: url

archived.description: The archived status of the page.
archived.title: archived

post.description: Creates a new page in the specified database. existing page.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Schema of properties for the database as they appear in Notion.

parameters.name: block_id
parameters.description: Identifier for a Notion block or page

get.description: Retrieves a list of un-resolved Comment objects from a page or block.

post.description: Creates a comment in a page or existing discussion thread.

content.description: Text content. This field contains the actual content of your text and is probably the field you'll use most often.
content.title: Content

text.description: Text objects contain Content and Link within the text property.

rich_text.description: Rich text objects contain data for displaying formatted text, mentions, and equations.

page_id.description: The ID of the page that this page belongs to.
page_id.title: Page Id

discussion_id.description: Unique identifier of the discussion thread that the comment is associated with.
discussion_id.title: Discussion id

created_time.description: Date and time when this comment was created.
created_time.title: Created time

last_edited_time.description: Date and time when this comment was updated.
last_edited_time.title: Last edited time

link.description: Any inline link in this text.
link.title: Link

text.description: Text objects contain Content and Link within the text property.

href.description: (optional)  The URL of any link or internal Notion mention in this text, if any.
href.title: href

rich_text.description: Content of the comment, which supports rich text formatting, links, and mentions.
rich_text.title: Rich text

created_time.description: Date and time when this database was created. Formatted as an ISO 8601 date time string.
created_time.title: Created time

last_edited_time.description: Date and time when this database was updated. Formatted as an ISO 8601 date time string.
last_edited_time.title: Last edited time

last_edited_by.description: User who last edited the database.
last_edited_by.title: Last edited by

archived.description: The archived status of the database.
archived.title: Archived

properties.description: Schema of properties for the database as they appear in Notion.
properties.title: Properties

url.description: The URL of the Notion database
url.title: URL
